snippet: The attack was an attempt to stop the guard from reporting an elder-care scheme against his mother, the police said, and it was not related to his work.
abstract: Oneida County sheriff Robert Maciol says three people were charged with assaulting prison guard Alan Dobransky when package left at his mailbox exploded; Maciol says attack was intended to stop Dobransky from reporting an elder-care scheme against his mother.
lead_paragraph: The attack was an attempt to stop the guard from reporting an elder-care scheme against his mother, the police said, and it was not related to his work.

headline.main: 3 Charged With Injuring New York Prison Guard With Exploding Package
